class_notes:
(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)


Students are required to complete a PSYC 499R Contract.  Please contact Ms. Lorenza Houser (lhouser@emory.edu) to get a copy of the contract.  Completed and signed contract must be submitted to Ms. Houser on or before the end of add/drop/swap for enrollment.
course_description: Credit variable. Psychology majors only, registration by permission of faculty supervisor.
